content: add a spooky cute touch to your life with this ghostie pumpkin hanger when made with worsted weight yarn both ghostie and pumpkin are approximately 2 inches which makes it a great size if you want to place it in your car materials needed * 4 mm crochet hook * worsted weight yarn in white black orange and green * 12 mm plastic safety eyes * stitch marker * stuffing * scissors * yarn needle this is a free crochet pattern designed by wild tulip crochet /designers/wild-tulip-crochet please do not copy sell alter distribute or claim this work as your own this pattern is solely for personal use you may sell finished items made from this pattern but please credit wild tulip crochet as the designer and link back to my ig page @wild tulip crochet
